      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean DBImplementation.deleteUser(int id)
      Deletes a user from the system by their unique identifier.
      boolean MockModelDAO.deleteUser(int id)
      Simulates user deletion by returning true for positive IDs.

      Deletes a user from the data store by their unique identifier.
      java.util.ArrayList<User> DBImplementation.getUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users from the system.

      Simulates retrieving all users by returning a predefined list of mock users.

      Retrieves a list of all users from the data store.
      Profile DBImplementation.login(java.lang.String credential, java.lang.String password)
      Authenticates a user with the provided credentials.

      Simulates user login by returning a predefined mock profile.

      Authenticates a user using provided credentials.
      User DBImplementation.register(User user)
      Registers a new user in the system with duplicate credential checking.

      Simulates user registration by returning a predefined mock user.
      User ModelDAO.register(User user)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      boolean DBImplementation.updateUser(User user)
      Updates an existing user's information in the system.
      boolean MockModelDAO.updateUser(User user)
      Simulates user update operation by always returning true.
      boolean ModelDAO.updateUser(User user)
      Updates an existing user's information in the data store.
